name: Harold Tales - End D
description:
Hey, Zakie-poo?

Yeah, Mino-moo?

Are you sure you’re up for this? You know that Reid is a complete asshole right?

Priscilla’s there to rein him down. Also, he’s got some surprises waiting for him. “Fun” surprises I might add.

Really? Fun? You were really, really annoyed at them when they started spinning round and round and they all go AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA-

O-Okay, Mino-moo! You don’t have to remind me! Ugh! Now I’m getting the jitters.

Ehehe. This has been fun. Setting all this up.

…Yeah. I enjoyed this.

Zakie-poo? Do you think we have too many cooks in the kitchen here?

Probably? I don’t really give a damn tho. Let people think as they please. Impressions aside, this is for a greater cause on our end.

To save our friend and convince him of his true feelings, we will do what is must. Even if it means changing our wishes accordingly.

…Do you love him more than me, Zakie-poo?

Don’t misunderstand, Mino-moo. You are irreplaceable to me. But I don’t want to think you’re the only creature I ever care about. Since the world doesn’t revolve around the two of us. So you don’t have to get jealous. 

…Thanks for the transparency. I-I’m just worried is all. You’re doing this so fervently. For him no less. Not that I don’t respect him. Its just… you’re very passionate for him just like you used to be when you were with Oldhar.

I guess so. But he is my childhood friend. I would do anything for his true happiness. I didn’t do him right back then during the tournament of Harolds. So this time, I’ll make it right.

Anyways, sounds like he and Priscilla are approaching. Time for us to begin.

Right. And Zakie-poo?

Yeah?

If he ever pisses you off, the most you can do is just fight seriously, ok? I don’t want you to fill yourself with hatred and vengeance for the guy before its all over.

….I’ll try, Mino-moo.

I love you sugar cube.

Love you too sweetpea.

--------------

Controls

Z/Enter - Select

X/Esc - Cancel

Arrow Keys = Move
